About Myriam Nader-Salomon (Myriam Nader Haitian Art Gallery)

Myriam Nader-Salomon (Myriam Nader Haitian Art Gallery) provides professional art appraisal services in Miami. With expertise in Haitian art, Caribbean art, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.
